rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: Large entrance with integrated living area, featuring a glass facade for natural light and ventilation; includes open layout for spacious feel and connectivity with the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Modern kitchen adjacent to dining area, incorporating energy-efficient appliances and natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows; designed in accordance with Vastu principles for functional flow.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Eco-friendly gym area equipped with sustainable materials, natural ventilation, and ample windows to provide an uplifting atmosphere and energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom & Utility
rooms.description: Utility room including a guest bathroom, designed with water-efficient fixtures and natural light; supports overall eco-friendly design.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Energy-efficient door with sound insulation, aligning with natural aesthetics and security standards.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Windows
openings.description: Large windows offering abundant natural light while ensuring privacy; integrated shading to reduce heat gain.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Accessible entrance for deliveries and services, maintaining a clear separation from the main living area.

eco_features: Solar panels integration on the roof for sustainable energy.
Natural ventilation design to reduce reliance on mechanical cooling.
vastu_notes: Design ensures balance of elements with emphasis on north-west for entrance, east for kitchen, south-east for gym, and south-west for utilities, promoting harmony with the natural environment.
